Localization information for Polymath Argent Bloodline Your power comes from a long line of ancestors that have spent time in the Ethereal Plane, a space between worlds that requires the use of force magic to be effective. As such your force based magics are elevated to heights unknown to most others. In the past these ancestors have been referred to as Argent Savants, masters of force magic and abjuration.
Energized: Mage Armor Force magic flows through you and bolsters your resilience. When not wearing armor your AC is 13+Dex.Forceful SurgeYou may channel inborn energy into a surge of power that augments and enhances your offensive spells that deal force damage. You may activate a Forceful Surge as a bonus action to increase the damage your force spells by your proficiency modifier.Ethereal OverlordYour forceful surge is enhanced, increasing your connection to the ethereal plane. While active, you gain resistance to all damage and may teleport with Ethereal Jaunt as a bonus action on your turnEthereal Overlord: Ethereal JauntWhile Forceful Surge is active, you may teleport 22m (60ft) as a bonus action on your turnLove PointTestForceful SurgeYou channel this inborn energy into a surge of power that augments and enhances your offensive spells that deal force damage.Amped Shield Your bloodline grants you additional abjuration magic that allows you to protect yourself.
Foreceful Surge While in this state, damaging spells with the force damage type gain +X damage (X scales with sorc level)
End Foreceful Surge Use a bonus action to end your Forceful Surge.
Foreceful Surge Your surge makes you strong.
You have Advantage on Intelligence Checks and Saving Throws.
